Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I've been sitting here for ages.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Do you commoner even understand the concept of punctuality?

Choices.Choice2: I was preparing the best for you

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I apologize for the delay, sir.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: I was taking my time to prepare the best for you, sir.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Don't you dare mess up again.
Speaker.line2: Or I shall be reporting you to the highest manager.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: But enough rambling. Put my meal down already.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Hurry up and put my meal down already!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: What are you waiting for? Another moment to slack off?

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: Do your job, put my meal down already!

Speaker.name: Archibald_Upset
Speaker.line1: I can't believe how poor the service is here.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: [You serve the meal to Sir Archibald and start brewing the tea.]
